entry.title: Sharing the Story of Jesus | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 11 Q3 2020

media:group.media:title: Sharing the Story of Jesus | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 11 Q3 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 3, lesson 11 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is "Making Friends for God" and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled â€œSharing the Story of Jesusâ€ Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Reading: Eph. 2:1â€“10, 1 John 4:7â€“11, Mark 5:1â€“20, Heb. 10:19â€“22, Gal. 2:20, 1 Cor. 1:30.
Memory Text: â€œThese things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, that you may know that you have eternal life, and that you may continue to believe in the name of the Son of Godâ€ (1 John 5:13, NKJV).
(September 5 - September 11, 2020)
Sunday (Ryan Day) â€œJesus: The Basis of Our Testimonyâ€ Monday (Jill Morikone) â€œThe Transformative Power of Personal Testimonyâ€ Tuesday (Danny Shelton) â€œTelling the Story of Jesusâ€ Wednesday (John Lomacang) â€œTestifying With Assuranceâ€ Thursday (Kenny Shelton) â€œSomething Worth Testifying Aboutâ€

entry.title: Lessons Learned in God's Waiting Room | Sermon by Shelley Quinn

media:group.media:title: Lessons Learned in God's Waiting Room | Sermon by Shelley Quinn
media:group.media:description:
Church sermon produced by 3ABN with Shelley Quinn. Do you find yourself in emotional pain, physical pain, with anxiety ridden thoughts, or just going through mental anguish? In this episode Shelley shares her personal testimony on how the Lord has shown her His love and the many ways that God has helped her during uncounted hours of pain and suffering. Join 3ABN Shelley Quinn as she opens the Bible to teach from the word of God.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

media:group.media:title: 7 Dangers of Legalism vs Grace (Sermon)
media:group.media:description:
Church sermon produced by 3ABN with Jill Morikone. There seems to be a lot of confusion in the area of grace and legalism. For example, are we saved by works? If not what role do works play in the life of a christian? Where is the balance of trusting and believing in Jesus and rejecting the message of the Bible to walk as Jesus walked? The Bible teaches that we can have assurance of salvation and free of guilt. Join 3ABN Vice President/COO Jill Morikone as she opens the Bible to teach us about grace and legalism.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.
â¡ï¸SUBSCRIBE https://bit.ly/3ABN_Subscribe
